japanese: ふっ……素直じゃないね、お前は。/俺はな、将馬がチビだからとか、/野球やってるからとか……、
english: Tch... you're not honest.、/I mean, it's not because Shoma is short or plays baseball...

japanese: ふふ……。/キャンプファイアーの時間まで/忘れてしまわないようにね。
english: Hehe...、/Don't forget until the campfire time.

japanese: ふふ……じゃ、いくぞ。
english: Hehe... well then, let's go.

japanese: ふふ、きっとそうね。/それじゃ、色々案内してちょうだいね。
english: Hehe, I'm sure.、/Well then, show me around.

japanese: ふふ、冗談ですよ、先生。/ホラ、先生独身が長いから……とか。
english: Hehe, I'm joking, sensei.、/You know, sensei has been single a long time...

japanese: ふふっ、/!0、それは内緒だよ。
english: Hehe, !0, that's a secret.

japanese: ふふっ、バツらしいわね。
english: Hehe, that's so Batsu.

japanese: ふふっ、怒った顔も/チャーミングだぜ、!0。
english: Hehe, even your angry face is charming, !0.

japanese: ふふふ、せぇんぱぁい!h
english: Hehehe, senpaaai!

japanese: ふふふ、どうしよっかなぁ？/ふふふ……!h
english: Hehehe, what should I do?、/Hehehe...

japanese: ふふふ、バツ君。/お礼はデッサンモデルでいいわよ。/次の土曜日は空けといてね。
english: Hehehe, Batsu-kun.、/Payment can be as a drawing model.、/Keep next Saturday free.

japanese: ふふふ。/そぉですよぉ！
english: Hehehe.、/That's right!

japanese: ふふふっ。/そう……、/それでいいんですよ、先輩。
english: Hehehe.、/Yes...、/that's fine, senpai.

japanese: ふむ……/色々と参考になった。/礼を言うぞ。
english: Hmm...、/That was helpful.、/I thank you.

japanese: ふむ……なるほど。/今度はそこを意識してやってみよう。
english: Hmm... I see.、/Let's try being conscious of that next time.

japanese: ふーん……。とにかく、/ジャスティス学園に入ったんだから/勉強を頑張らないとな。
english: Hmm... Anyway, since I entered Justice Academy, I need to study hard.

japanese: ふーん……。とにかく、/ジャスティス学園に入ったんだから/勉強を頑張らないとね。
english: Hmm... Anyway, since I entered Justice Academy, I need to study hard.

japanese: ふーん、そういうもんかな？/男の子ってわかんないな。
english: Hmm, is that how it is?、/Boys are hard to understand.

japanese: ふーん、そういう態度をとるのかい。/ナマイキだねぇ……。
english: Hmm, that's the attitude you take.、/How cheeky...

japanese: ぶぅ〜っ、/も〜なんで私なのよぉ〜っ。
english: Boo...、/Why me...

japanese: ぶぅーーっ！/つまらないところですぅ！
english: Boo!、/Such a boring place!

japanese: へ、変な話をして、/スマンかったのう……。
english: S-sorry for the strange talk...

japanese: へぇ……/ひなたも結構しっかり/「お姉ちゃん」してるじゃないか。
english: Wow...、/Hinata is doing a good job as 'big sister'.

japanese: へぇ……/ひなたも結構しっかり/「お姉ちゃん」してるじゃないの。
english: Wow...、/Hinata is doing a good job as 'big sister'.

japanese: へぇ……/一体何を売ってるんだろ。
english: Wow...、/I wonder what they're selling.

japanese: へぇ……/一体何を売ってるんだろう。
english: Wow...、/I wonder what they're selling.

japanese: へぇ……。/お姉さん思いなんだな。/九郎って。
english: Wow...、/Kuro cares about his sister.

japanese: へぇ……。/お姉さん思いなんだね。/九郎って。
english: Wow...、/Kuro cares about his sister.

japanese: へぇ……。/それは知らなかったな。
english: Wow...、/I didn't know that.

japanese: へぇ……。/どういう風の吹き回しよ？
english: Wow...、/What brings you here?

japanese: へぇ……。/誰がその衣装を決めたんだ？
english: Wow...、/Who decided on that costume?

japanese: へぇ……そういうものなんですか？
english: Wow... is that how it is?

japanese: へぇ……そうなんだ。/でも、もうちょっとリラックスしてみても/いいんじゃないかな？
english: Wow... I see.、/But wouldn't it be okay to relax a bit more?

japanese: へぇ……そうなんですか。/でも、もうちょっとリラックスしてみても/いいんじゃないですか？
english: Wow... I see.、/But wouldn't it be okay to relax a bit more?

japanese: へぇ……！/キツネのデザインなんだな。/しっぽのところが、エッジの髪みたいだ！
english: Wow...!、/It's a fox design.、/The tail part looks like Edge's hair!

japanese: へぇ……！/絵のことはよくわからないけど、/俺も好きだな、この絵。
english: Wow...!、/I don't know much about art, but I like this painting too.

japanese: へぇ……！/絵のことはよくわからないけど、/私も好きだな、この絵。
english: Wow...!、/I don't know much about art, but I like this painting too.

japanese: へぇ……！　イイな、これ！/この木でできた飾りのところって/エッジが作ったのか？
english: Wow...! Nice, this!、/Did Edge make this wooden decoration part?

japanese: へぇ……！　イイね、これ！/この木でできた飾りのところって/エッジが作ったの？
english: Wow...! Nice, this!、/Did Edge make this wooden decoration part?

japanese: へぇ、うまいじゃない。/サンキュー、アキラ！
english: Wow, that's good.、/Thanks, Akira!

japanese: へぇ、うまいじゃないか。/サンキューな、アキラ！
english: Wow, that's good.、/Thanks, Akira!

japanese: へぇ、そうなんだ。/じゃあ、バツもサボったりしないで/ちゃんと頑張らないとな。
english: Wow, I see.、/Then Batsu should work hard without slacking.

japanese: へぇ、そうなんだ。/じゃあ、バツもサボったりしないで/ちゃんと頑張らないとね。
english: Wow, I see.、/Then Batsu should work hard without slacking.

japanese: へぇ、そうなんですか。
english: Wow, is that so.

japanese: へぇ、そんなことがわかるんですか？
english: Wow, you can tell that?

japanese: へぇ、めずらしい組み合わせだね。/岩とこずえ先輩が一緒なんて。/何の話をしてるの？
english: Wow, unusual combination.、/Iwa and Kozue-senpai together.、/What are you talking about?

japanese: へぇ、めずらしい組み合わせだね。/岩とこずえ先輩が一緒なんてさ。/何の話をしてるんだ？
english: Wow, unusual combination.、/Iwa and Kozue-senpai together.、/What are you talking about?

japanese: へぇ、ゆりかさん、/いっぱい金魚を持ってますね。/金魚すくいでもして来たんですか？
english: Wow, Yurika-san, you have lots of goldfish.、/Did you do goldfish scooping?

japanese: へぇ、ザキってやさしいんだな。
english: Wow, Zaki is kind.

japanese: へぇ、ザキってやさしいんだね。
english: Wow, Zaki is kind.

japanese: へぇ、ホームランなんてスゴイじゃない。/将馬、上手くなったのね。
english: Wow, a home run is amazing.、/Shoma, you've gotten better.

japanese: へぇ、ホームランなんてスゴイじゃん。/将馬、上手くなったんだな。
english: Wow, a home run is amazing.、/Shoma, you've gotten better.

japanese: へぇ、メダルじゃないか。/どうしたんだ？
english: Wow, a medal.、/What happened?

japanese: へぇ、何やったんだ？
english: Wow, what did you do?

japanese: へぇ、将馬ももう２年生だもんなぁ。
english: Wow, Shoma is already a second-year.

japanese: へぇ。/一体どうやってるの？
english: Wow.、/How do you do it?

japanese: へぇー、英雄先生、/水墨画なんて描くんですか？
english: Wow, Shimazu-sensei, you draw ink paintings?

japanese: へぇー、高そうな時計だな。/どうしたんだ？
english: Wow, that's an expensive-looking watch.、/What happened?

japanese: へぇ？/そうなのか？/俺、てっきり……
english: Huh?、/Is that so?、/I thought...

japanese: へぇ？/そうなの？/私、てっきり……
english: Huh?、/Is that so?、/I thought...

japanese: へっへっへ、/ま、やってみりゃわかるって。/バーンと来たトコにガーンだから。
english: Hehehe,、/well, try it and you'll see.、/Bang where it hits, so wham.

japanese: へへ……、自慢じゃねェけどよ、/オレは、手先は器用だぜ。/ナイフの扱いにも慣れてっしなァ！
english: Hehe... not to brag, but、/I'm good with my hands.、/I'm used to handling knives!

japanese: へへ……。
english: Hehe...

japanese: へへ……。/おっと、いけねェ！/大事なモンを忘れるところだった……。
english: Hehe...、/Oops, gotta go!、/I almost forgot something important...

japanese: へへ……。/さっきフリーマーケットで、/いい服を見つけたからな。
english: Hehe...、/I found good clothes at the flea market earlier.

japanese: へへ……。/でも、これならどうです？
english: Hehe...、/But how about this?

japanese: へへ……！/オレが発案者なんだぜ！/結構イイだろ？
english: Hehe...!、/I'm the one who came up with it!、/Pretty good, right?

japanese: へへ、そうこなくちゃな！/なぁ、姫！　/俺たちもフォークダンスを踊ろうぜ！
english: Hehe, that's the spirit!、/Hey, Hime!、/Let's dance the folk dance too!

japanese: へへ、そうこなくちゃ！/ねぇ、姫！　/私たちもフォークダンスを踊ろうよ！
english: Hehe, that's the spirit!、/Hey, Hime!、/Let's dance the folk dance too!

japanese: へへ、そっか？/似てっかな……。
english: Hehe, is that so?、/Maybe similar...

japanese: へへ、そっだな。/じゃあ、行こうぜェ！
english: Hehe, that's right.、/Then let's go!

japanese: へへ、それはヒミツーーっ。
english: Hehe, that's a seeecret.

japanese: へへ、それは秘密。
english: Hehe, that's a secret.

japanese: へへ、わ、わかる？/ボクみたいに繊細な心を持った人間は、/作品にそれがにじみ出てしまうんだなァ。
english: Hehe, d-do you see?、/People with sensitive hearts like me、/it seeps into our work.

japanese: へへ、サンキューな。/これからもサボってるヤツがいたら、/怒鳴り飛ばしてやるぜ！
english: Hehe, thanks.、/If anyone slacks off from now on, I'll yell at them!

japanese: へへっ、まだレギュラーじゃねぇけどな。/一軍に上がってからは、少しずつだけど/活躍してんだぜ。
english: Hehe, I'm not a regular yet.、/But since making first string, I've been contributing bit by bit.

japanese: へへーン、わかるか？/見ろよ、ホラこれ。
english: Hehe, see?、/Look, here.

japanese: へへーン、当ててみなって。
english: Hehe, try guessing.

japanese: へー、先生にも若い頃があったんですか。
english: Wow, sensei had a youth too.

japanese: へー、先生にも若い頃があったんですね。
english: Wow, sensei had a youth too.

japanese: へ！？/そ、そうだよな。全然よくないぞ！/（何の話かわからないけど……）
english: What!?、/Y-yeah. That's not good at all!、(I don't know what we're talking about...)

japanese: へ？/……まぁ確かに、運動神経はいいし、/あれで結構、勉強もできるしな。
english: Huh?、/...Well, he has good reflexes and studies well too.

japanese: へ？/う、うん……、うまいよ……。
english: Huh?、/Y-yeah... it's good...

japanese: へ？/う、うん……、とっても……。
english: Huh?、/Y-yeah... very...

japanese: へ？/お化け屋敷ぃ？
english: Huh?、/Haunted house?

japanese: へ？/ゆりかさん、/お化け屋敷とか平気なんですか？
english: Huh?、/Yurika-san, are you okay with haunted houses?

japanese: へ？/流さん、/合コンに行ったことないんですか？
english: Huh?、/Nagare-san, haven't you been to a mixer?

japanese: へ？/流先輩、/合コンに行ったことないんですか？
english: Huh?、/Nagare-senpai, haven't you been to a mixer?

japanese: べ、別に……。
english: N-not really...

japanese: ほ、他の部員が知らない間に、/ワタシたちを撮ってたのよ……。/よく写ってるからって、くれたの……。
english: O-other club members took photos of us without us knowing...、/They gave them to us because we looked good...

japanese: ほぅ……。/それは興味深い話ですねぇ……。/「魂が吸い込まれるような……」ですか。
english: Hmm...、/That's an interesting story...、/'As if the soul is being drawn in...' is it?

japanese: ほう、それは頼もしいですね。/……この絵はねぇ、/私の故郷の風景なんですよ。
english: Well, that's reliable.、/...This painting is of my hometown.

japanese: ほう！/それは素晴らしいじゃないですか！/さっそくお願いに行ってまいります！！
english: Well!、/That's wonderful!、/I'll go make the request right away!!

japanese: ほぉ……だがオマエ、/自分のクラスはどうするつもりだ。/戻って手伝った方がいいんじゃねぇのか？
english: Hmm... but you, what about your own class?、/Shouldn't you go back and help?

japanese: ほぉ、!0君は/難しい言葉を知ってますね。/そう、まさにそんな感じですよ。
english: Hmm,　!0-kun knows difficult words.、/Yes, exactly that feeling.

japanese: ほめに来たのよ。/マジメに働いてるみたいじゃない。/感心感心！
english: I came to praise you.、/You seem to be working seriously.、/Impressive impressive!

japanese: ほめに来たんだ。/マジメに働いてるみたいだな、感心感心。
english: I came to praise you.、/You seem to be working seriously, impressive impressive.

japanese: ほら、!0の脇のところ。/ほつれちゃったんだよ。
english: Look, !0's armpit area.、/It came undone.

japanese: ほら、すぐそういうことをいう。/アキラは、みんなと同じになりたくて/聖純女学院に転校したわけじゃないだろ？
english: See, you say that right away.、/Akira didn't transfer to Seijun Girls' Academy to be like everyone else, right?

japanese: ほら、すぐそういうことをいう。/アキラは、みんなと同じになりたくて/聖純女学院に転校したわけじゃないでしょ？
english: See, you say that right away.、/Akira didn't transfer to Seijun Girls' Academy to be like everyone else, right?
